tool_description: This api is used to get version list and download for Minectaft, Forge and Optifine.
name: Minecraft-Forge-Optifine
title: Minecraft-Forge-Optifine

api_list.name: optifineVersionList
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nitroxenon-minecraft-forge-v1.p.rapidapi.com/optifine/versionlist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nitroxenon-minecraft-forge-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
